title: New Client Update not fair

replies.body:
A workaround was[ posted on the client boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion/irEothGt-workaround-for-launching-the-legacy-client) to the following:

Go to your League of Legends install folder. Default is (C:\Riot Games\League of Legends) go to \RADS\system
Locate the user.cfg file and open with notepad
Change leagueClientOptIn = yes to leagueClientOptIn = no
Save and launch League of Legends again.

When you get a chance share your report over at that thread, so they can collect details and work on a fix for this.
